page.title: 07CHRISTOPHER TANCREDS GHOST
page.content: When we went to Whixley and to the church the vicar told us a story about a man called Chistopher Tancred.This is it: Chistopher Tancred lived in the house behind the church.Chistopher Tancreds family were the heads of the village.In Christopher's will he left alot of money to the community but he said instead of being buried under- ground he wanted to be put in a tomb in his house.So when he died he was. When the house was sold the people who bought it didn't like the idea of hav- ing a tomb in their house so it was moved to the church.Every night he is said to get out of his tomb,go through a door in the church,then through a hole in the wall near the church and go back to his home and haunt it.
